title: How long does it take to reach honor level 2 from level 0?
body: I had got a chat restriction a few months ago, my honor level got locked and dropped to 0. Now it is still zero, at 1 of its three checkpoints. I get a couple of honors from teammates each game, so how long exactly does it take for me to level up my honor level?{{champion:122}}

replies.body:
While there isn't a specific amount of time that it takes to upgrade your honour, Riot did recently update the Honour system to make it easier for dishonoured players get back to honourable:

> After popping the hood on Honour, we're seeing that the path back from dishonour is a bit too harsh. So now it's less steep. There are no other changes to Honour.
[](https://leagueoflegends.com)
> **HONOUR RECLIMBS** The requirements to move up from Dishonourable to Honour level 2 have been lowered

https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-86-notes#patch-honor
